content: R2.1 requires a start date for Tobacco Use. I would imagine that a patient would know the age at which they started smoking but not the specific date (or even year for that matter). How do I go about submitting this as a suggested change to HL7?
Hi SueAnn, this is the FHIR Implementers stream. It would be more appropriate to continue the discussion on this stream: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179311-C-CDA
